title: Pixel 3 battery drain too quickly - last 15H a day, average use 2/2.30 hours
content:
Bought a Pixel 3 on last December 20. After full charge, battery last around 15-16 hours only. From 'Digital Wellbeing' app, average screentime is 2-2.30 hours. Always turn on "Battery Saver". Also, use "Adaptive Battery" feature. Nothing helps.
Very disappointed. Any tips?
